pullrequest.title: fix build on homebrew with ffmpeg4

content.raw: I won't block on this, but it might be nice to include an explanation of where these magic numbers come from. As it stands, I just have to trust that the test writers knew what they were doing, because I'm having trouble finding libavcodec documentation to back up these assumptions.
content.html: I won't block on this, but it might be nice to include an explanation of where these magic numbers come from. As it stands, I just have to trust that the test writers knew what they were doing, because I'm having trouble finding libavcodec documentation to back up these assumptions.
